sysQueue.h

00001 /**********************************************************************/
00017 #ifndef _SYSQUEUE_H
00018 #define _SYSQUEUE_H
00019 
00020 #include <sysTypes.h>
00021 
00022 /***************************************************************************
00023   Declare a queue and reset to the default state
00024   Every queue should be declared with this macros!
00025   Any queue element passed as parameter to functions should have as first
00026   field pointer for adding to a queue.
00027 
00028   Parameters:
00029     queue - the name of object.
00030   Returns:
00031     None
00032 ****************************************************************************/
00033 #define DECLARE_QUEUE(queue) QueueDescriptor_t queue = {.head = NULL,}
00034 
00035 // Type of queue element
00036 typedef struct _QueueElement_t
00037 {
00038   struct _QueueElement_t *next;
00039 } QueueElement_t;
00040 
00041 // Queue descriptor
00042 typedef struct
00043 {
00044   QueueElement_t *head;
00045 } QueueDescriptor_t;
00046 
00047 /***************************************************************************
00048   Reset a queue
00049   Parameters:
00050     queue - pointer to a queue descriptor
00051   Returns:
00052     None
00053 ****************************************************************************/
00054 INLINE void resetQueue(QueueDescriptor_t *queue)
00055 {
00056   queue->head = NULL;
00057 }
00058 
00059 /***************************************************************************
00060   Get a element from a queue. Element is got from the head
00061   Parameters:
00062     queue - pointer to a queue descriptor
00063   Returns:
00064     None
00065 ****************************************************************************/
00066 INLINE void *getQueueElem(const QueueDescriptor_t *queue)
00067 {
00068   return queue->head;
00069 }
00070 
00071 /***************************************************************************
00072   Get next element of queue after current element. The movement is made from
00073   head to tail. At the beginning of looking for elements the head element
00074   should be obtained.
00075   Parameters:
00076     currElement - current element
00077   Returns:
00078     NULL     - no next element
00079     NOT NULL - next element is got
00080 ****************************************************************************/
00081 INLINE void* getNextQueueElem(const void *currElem)
00082 {
00083   return currElem? ((const QueueElement_t*) currElem)->next: NULL;
00084 }
00085 
00086 bool isQueueElem(const QueueDescriptor_t *const queue, const void *const element);
00087 bool putQueueElem(QueueDescriptor_t *queue, void *element);
00088 void *deleteHeadQueueElem(QueueDescriptor_t *queue);
00089 bool  deleteQueueElem(QueueDescriptor_t *queue, void *element);
00090 
00091 #endif
00092 //eof sysQueue.h
